Text:
Nick and Norah's Infinite Playlist (2008)

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0981227/

in bluray please

I am glad you get it right. I admit, it is pretty unusual for people who visit TPB.

OK, but next time try to fulfill "directions" I asked for when doing Request (like Which frame-format, file-size and specific Reason why do you ask and not getting torrent someplace else).

And - please, try to step on a brake, because it is you third or fourth request in a month. It is over the top and might "deplete" your prospects here.
